trans-unit.source: Specifies a component that creates an icon in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 指定可在通知区域创建图标的组件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Icons in the notification area are shortcuts to processes that are running in the background of a computer, such as a virus protection program or a volume control.
trans-unit.target: 通知区域中的图标是快捷方式，在一台计算机，例如病毒防护程序或卷控件的背景中运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: These processes do not come with their own user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这些进程不会使用其自己的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class provides a way to program in this functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类以此功能提供程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A> property defines the icon that appears in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>属性定义将出现在通知区域图标。

trans-unit.source: Pop-up menus for an icon are addressed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 弹出菜单的图标都与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A> property assigns ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>属性指定工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: In order for the icon to show up in the notification area, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 为了使图标以显示在通知区域中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性必须设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: to create the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> component.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />组件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>创建后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property to `true` in order to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> you created.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性`true`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>你创建。

trans-unit.source: This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 此实例将存在，直到其容器将它释放到垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> that represents the container for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> 控件的容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> class with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的容器初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>创建后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property to `true` in order to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> you created.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性`true`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>你创建。

trans-unit.source: This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 此实例将存在，直到其容器将它释放到垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击气球提示时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `NotifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`NotifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is closed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当用户关闭气球状提示时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display on the balloon tip associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 相关联的气球状提示上显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" /> to display on the balloon tip associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 相关联的气球状提示上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `notifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`notifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`SetBalloonTip`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 当屏幕上显示气球状提示时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipShown> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipShown>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the balloon tip associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 相关联的气球状提示上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the balloon tip associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 相关联的气球状提示上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `notifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`notifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`SetBalloonTip`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of the balloon tip displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 上显示的气球状提示的标题。

trans-unit.source: The text to display as the title of the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 要作为气球状提示的标题显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 标题文本将显示在顶部附近的气球状加粗字体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipIcon%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `notifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`notifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`SetBalloonTip`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the icon in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击通知区域中的图标时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added the code to a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> object named `NotifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定向窗体包含添加了代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>对象名为`NotifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the icon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图标的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" /> for the icon.
trans-unit.target: 图标的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The menu is shown when the user right-clicks an icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 当用户右键单击任务栏的通知区域中的图标，将显示菜单。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut menus also are known as pop-up menus.
trans-unit.target: 快捷菜单也被称为弹出菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 关联的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击任务栏的通知区域中的图标时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current icon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前图标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> component.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 组件显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `NotifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`NotifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Displays the balloon tip in the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 在任务栏中显示气球提示。

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.
trans-unit.target: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

trans-unit.source: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.
trans-unit.target: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

trans-unit.source: Displays a balloon tip in the taskbar for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 指定时间段内在任务栏中显示气球状提示。

trans-unit.source: Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 最小和最大超时值由操作系统强制执行，并且通常是 10 到 30 秒，分别，但是这具体取决于操作系统而异。

trans-unit.source: Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 太大或太小的超时值调整为适当的最小值或最大值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果用户未显示要使用 （没有键盘或鼠标事件的发生） 的计算机则系统不计算此时间在超时值。

trans-unit.source: Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个气球状提示可以在任务栏上显示一次。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在一个当前显示在任务栏原因时显示的气球状提示`timeout`值被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application.
trans-unit.target: 行为会略有不同，具体取决于操作系统和气球状提示是否从另一个，或同一应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 第二个显示，而不考虑的值之前从其他应用程序的第二个的气球状提示时，第一个气球状提示将显示的最小超时值`timeout`。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一个应用程序，第一个的气球状提示立即关闭时再次调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A>方法由。

trans-unit.source: In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下第二个气球状将在第一次气球之上打开。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 标题文本将显示在顶部附近的气球状加粗字体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `notifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`notifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`SetBalloonTip`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.
trans-unit.target: 气球状提示应显示的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，否决此参数。

trans-unit.source: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.
trans-unit.target: 现在通知显示时间是基于系统辅助功能设置。

trans-unit.source: The title to display on the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 要在气球状提示上显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 要在气球状提示上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Displays a balloon tip with the specified title, text, and icon in the taskbar for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 在指定时间段内，在任务栏中显示具有指定标题、文本和图标的气球状提示。

trans-unit.source: Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 最小和最大超时值由操作系统强制执行，并且通常是 10 到 30 秒，分别，但是这具体取决于操作系统而异。

trans-unit.source: Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 太大或太小的超时值调整为适当的最小值或最大值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果用户未显示要使用 （没有键盘或鼠标事件的发生） 的计算机则系统不计算此时间在超时值。

trans-unit.source: Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个气球状提示可以在任务栏上显示一次。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在一个当前显示在任务栏原因时显示的气球状提示`timeout`值被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application.
trans-unit.target: 行为会略有不同，具体取决于操作系统和气球状提示是否从另一个，或同一应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 第二个显示，而不考虑的值之前从其他应用程序的第二个的气球状提示时，第一个气球状提示将显示的最小超时值`timeout`。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果气球提示来自同一个应用程序，第一个的气球状提示立即关闭时再次调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A>方法由。

trans-unit.source: In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下第二个气球状将在第一次气球之上打开。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 标题文本将显示在顶部附近的气球状加粗字体。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> named `notifyIcon1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>名为`notifyIcon1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `Form1_DoubleClick` method in this example with the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 将关联`Form1_DoubleClick`方法在此示例中处理该窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tipText" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tipText" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tipIcon" /> is not a member of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tipIcon" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: for access to application windows.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问应用程序窗口。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相关的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含有关 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon" /> 的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针停留在通知区域图标上时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: If the text is `null`, no ToolTip is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本是`null`，没有工具提示显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: ToolTip text is more than 63 characters long.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示文本长度超过 63 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the icon is visible in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示任务栏的通知区域是否会显示图标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the icon is visible in the notification area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果图标在通知区域中可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Since the default value is `false`, in order for the icon to show up in the notification area, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 由于默认值是`false`，才会显示在通知区域图标，你必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> class to display an icon for an application in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>类来显示在通知区域中的应用程序的图标。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> properties and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which allows the user to close the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>与**退出**在其上的项分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它允许用户关闭应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick> event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.DoubleClick>事件发生时，通过调用激活应用程序窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
